items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.
items.effect: Heal 2d4+2 HP

items.name: Arrows +1 (Bundle of 20)
items.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
items.effect: +1 to attack and damage (consumed on hit)

items.name: Thieves' Tools (Masterwork)
items.description: These masterfully crafted thieves' tools grant a +1 bonus to ability checks made to pick locks and disarm traps.
items.effect: +1 to checks for picking locks and disarming traps

items.name: Climber's Kit (Enhanced)
items.description: This enhanced climber's kit includes special pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. You have advantage on ability checks made to climb.
items.effect: Advantage on climbing checks

items.name: Healer's Kit (Expanded)
items.description: This kit has 20 uses. As an action, you can expend one use to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.
items.effect: Stabilize dying creatures (20 uses)

items.name: Potion of Climbing
items.description: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb.
items.effect: 1 hour: climbing speed, advantage on climb checks

items.name: Antitoxin (3 vials)
items.description: A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour. It confers no benefit to undead or constructs.
items.effect: 1 hour: advantage on saves vs poison

items.name: Smoke Stick (Pack of 3)
items.description: When lit, this stick fills a 10-foot cube with thick smoke that heavily obscures the area. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by wind.
items.effect: 10 ft cube of heavy obscurement for 1 minute

items.name: Caltrops (Bag of 100)
items.description: As an action, you can spread these caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage.
items.effect: 5 ft area: DC 15 DEX or stop + 1 damage

items.name: Hunting Trap
items.description: When you use your action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on it. DC 13 DEX save or take 1d4 piercing and stop moving.
items.effect: DC 13 DEX or 1d4 damage + restrained

items.name: Oil Flask (Pack of 5)
items.description: You can splash oil on a creature within 5 feet or throw it up to 20 feet. If lit, the target takes 5 fire damage at the start of each of its turns for 2 rounds.
items.effect: 5 fire damage per turn for 2 rounds when lit

items.name: Ball Bearings (Bag of 1000)
items.description: As an action, you can spill these to cover a 10-foot-square area. A creature moving through must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
items.effect: 10 ft area: DC 10 DEX or fall prone

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: A grappling hook can be thrown up to 50 feet with a rope attached. It can anchor to ledges, windowsills, or other protrusions.
items.effect: 50 ft throwing range with rope

items.name: Silk Rope (50 ft)
items.description: Silk rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check. It's lighter and more compact than hemp rope.
items.effect: Lightweight, DC 17 to burst

items.name: Acid Vial (Pack of 3)
items.description: As an action, you can splash the contents onto a creature within 5 feet or throw the vial up to 20 feet. Make a ranged attack. On hit, the target takes 2d6 acid damage.
items.effect: Ranged attack: 2d6 acid damage

items.name: Alchemist's Fire (Pack of 3)
items.description: Make a ranged attack against a creature or object within 20 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check.
items.effect: Ranged: 1d4 fire/turn until DC 10 DEX check

items.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
items.description: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.
items.effect: Advantage on Stealth; disadvantage to be seen

items.name: Bracers of Archery
items.description: While wearing these bracers, you have proficiency with the longbow and shortbow, and you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls on ranged attacks made with such weapons.
items.effect: +2 damage with longbows and shortbows

items.name: Boots of Elvenkind
items.description: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound, regardless of the surface you are moving across. You also have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.
items.effect: Silent movement; advantage on Stealth for moving quietly

items.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
items.description: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect on you if your Strength is already 19 or higher.
items.effect: Strength becomes 19

items.name: Cloak of Protection
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.
items.effect: +1 AC and +1 to all saving throws

items.name: Bag of Holding
items.description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions. The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet.
items.effect: Holds 500 lbs in extradimensional space

items.name: Rapier +1
items.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
items.effect: +1 to attack and damage rolls

items.name: Longbow +1
items.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
items.effect: +1 to attack and damage rolls

items.name: Dagger of Venom
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. You can use an action to cause thick, black poison to coat the blade. The poison remains for 1 minute or until an attack using this weapon hits a creature. That creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The dagger can't be used this way again until the next dawn.
items.effect: Once per day: +2d10 poison damage, target poisoned (DC 15 CON)

items.name: Flame Tongue Longsword
items.description: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits.
items.effect: Bonus action: +2d6 fire damage, 40 ft bright light

items.name: Oathbow
items.description: When you nock an arrow on this bow, it whispers in Elvish: 'Swift defeat to my enemies.' When you use this weapon to make a ranged attack, you can speak its command phrase to mark a sworn enemy. Your ranged attacks with this weapon against your sworn enemy deal an extra 3d6 damage.
items.effect: Mark sworn enemy: +3d6 damage, advantage, can't have disadvantage

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.
items.effect: +1 AC and +1 to all saving throws

items.name: Vorpal Sword
items.description: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you attack a creature that has at least one head with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you cut off one of the creature's heads. The creature dies if it can't survive without the lost head.
items.effect: +3 weapon; nat 20 = decapitation (instant kill if creature needs head)

items.name: Cloak of Invisibility
items.description: While wearing this cloak, you can pull its hood over your head to cause yourself to become invisible. While you are invisible, anything you are carrying or wearing is invisible with you. You become visible when you cease wearing the hood. The cloak has 2 hours of invisibility per day.
items.effect: 2 hours of true invisibility per day (action to activate)
